title: Tongue Thai'd with Pangina Heals
overview: Pangina Heals, star of Drag Race Thailand and RuPaul's Drag Race UK vs the World takes us on a food tour of Thai Town in Hollywood, CA. She challenges her guests to amp up the spice, from one dish to the next, as they spill secrets over a meal of Thai delicacies. Don't get burned! Sweat it out with Pangina Heals.
